name: To do or not to do
name_original: To do or not to do
description:
This is a choose your adventure novel made for the Hamlet Jam 2020

To do or not to do? You get to choose! Play as Hamlet the Prince of Denmark and avenge your father.

CONTENT WARNING: It contains explicit language and a general sense of weirdness due to my failed attempt at humor.

This interactive novel contains:

  • 25+ choices
  • 10 endings
  • 5000+ words

Playtime: 15 - 30 minutes
